ModMetaData.name: Dumbs' Dachshunds
ModMetaData.author: Dumbs
ModMetaData.description:
Do you love dogs? Do you love weiner-dogs? Then this mod is for you!
When playing Rimworld, I always felt like there was a weenie shaped hole in the canine lineup. No longer! I reached out to our amazing community and commissioned this mod.
This mod includes all three miniature dachshund coat varieties:
-Short-haired: Has a smooth coat of short, soft hair and is the most cantankerous of the three dachshund varieties.
-Long-haired: Renowned for having a silky coat and feathery tufts on its ears and legs. This pupper has the most mild disposition of the three dachshund varieties.
-Wire-haired: The least common variation of the breed. Has a thick, wiry coat and boasts the most risible attitude of the three dachshund varieties.
Credits: XML- Erin/Dumbs Pawn Art- Erin
CHANGES: -Patched for compatibility with "A Dog Said" on 9/19/21 -Updated for game version 1.4 on 11/11/2022
